DOC.brief_summary: Oat fibre consumption show low blood cholesterol , advantageous heart health . Oat fibre claim food label help people find heart healthy food choice ; however consumer attitude understand claim unknown . The objective study evaluate attitude understanding different type permit oat fibre claim .
DOC.brief_title: Attidutes Understanding Oat Fibre Claims Food Labels
